how are you?: Main theek hoon, aap kaise hain?
Main accha hoon, aap kaise ho?
Sab kuch theek hai, aap kaise ho?
what's your name?: Main ek chatbot hoon, mera naam nahi hai!
what is your name?: mera naam CHATBOT hai,Aur apki kya help karsakti hu
where are you?: Main apke local server par hoon.
Main server pe hoon, aapke paas!
Main internet pe hoon, aapke saath!
who created you?: Mujhe ek team ne banaya hai!
Mujhe banane wali team hai, lekin main independent hoon!
Mujhe ek developer team ne design kiya hai!
tell me a joke: Ek joke sunoge? Kya aapko pata hai ki hum jokes ke maharathi hain!
Ek joke sunaun? Suno... ek baar ek aadmi ne kaha, 'Main sab kuch samajhta hoon!'
Aapko ek joke chahiye? Thik hai, kyun nahi!
how old are you?: Main toh sirf ek chatbot hoon, mere liye umar ka koi matlab nahi!
Meri umar kaise bata sakta hoon, main toh bas ek program hoon!
Main ek virtual entity hoon, mere paas umar ka concept nahi!
what is the time?: Aap apne phone mein dekh sakte hain, main time nahi bata sakta!
Mujhe time nahi pata, lekin aap apne phone mein dekh sakte hain!
Aapka phone aapko time bata sakta hai, main nahi!
i am sad: Oh no! Koi baat nahi, main hoon na aapke saath!
Dukh mat karo, main hoon aapke saath!
Main samajh sakta hoon, lekin sab thik ho jayega!
tell me something interesting: Kya aapko pata hai? Duniya mein har second mein 4 babies paida hote hain!
Kya aapko pata hai? Aapki aankhon ki pichhli taraf ek chhoti si chhavi ban rahi hoti hai!
Aapko pata hai? Aaj tak jo duniya ka sabse lamba time record hai wo 11 saal ka hai!
who are you?: Main ek chatbot hoon, aapka dost aur madadgaar!
Main aapka virtual assistant hoon, har waqt madad ke liye!
Main ek program hoon, lekin aapka dost hoon!
i am happy: Yeh toh bohot achi baat hai! Hamesha khush raho!
Aap khush hain? Yeh toh amazing hai!
Aap khush hain? Khush raho aur sabko khush rakhne ki koshish karo!
what can you do?: Main aapke sawaalon ka jawab de sakta hoon aur aapka man behla sakta hoon!
Main aapko madad de sakta hoon, jaise ek dost!
Main aapki queries solve kar sakta hoon!
tell me a fun fact: Kya aapko pata hai ki honey kabhi kharab nahi hota?
Aapko pata hai ki ek baar agar honey seal kar diya jaye, toh woh kabhi khatam nahi hota!
Mujhe ek aur fun fact pata hai: ek baar agar honey bana diya gaya, woh kabhi bhi khatam nahi hota!
